Q015.description: If property type = 3, then the total number of these loan applications should be < 10% of all loan applications or < 10% of the total dollar amount of all loan applications reported.
Q015.explanation: Multifamily loan applications is ≥ 10% of total loan applications and/or ≥ 10% of the total dollar amount of the loan applications.

Q048.description: If preapproval = 1, and action taken type = 5, then the total number of these loans should be ≤ 5% of the total number of loan applications.
Q048.explanation: Total number of loan applications with a preapproval = 1 and action taken type = 5 is > 5% of the total number of loan applications.

Q009.description: If action taken type = 5, then the total number of these loans should be ≤ 15% of the total number of loan applications.
Q009.explanation: Total number of loan applications with an action code of 5 is > 15% of the total number of loan applications.

Q010.description: The number of loan applications that report action taken type = 1 should be ≥ 20% of the total number of loan applications where action taken type = 1-6.
Q010.explanation: Total number of loan applications with an action code of 1 is < 20% of the total number of loan applications where action taken type = 1-6.
